name: start-kit
description: A starter for writing Domo Apps in ES6

scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test karma start ./karma.conf.js --single-run --browsers PhantomJS
scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test karma start ./karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.coveralls: npm run test-ci && node node_modules/lcov-filter/index.js ./coverage/phantomjs/lcov.info spec | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run changelog && git add -A CHANGELOG.md
scripts.upload: npm run build && cd dist/ && domo publish && cp manifest.json ../domo/ && cd ..

author: AppTeam6 <Squad.AppTeam6@domo.com>
